title: Loves of Casanova
creator_credit: Noë Bloch, Alexandre Volkoff, Ivan Mosjoukine, Norbert Falk, Société des Cinéromans, Deulig Film and Ciné-Alliance
brief_description: Republic of Venice, 1760. Pursued by a vengeful husband, the intrepid womanizer Casanova, who symbolizes the decline of the city and its fall into debauchery, manages to escape and, by a circuitous route, arrives in Saint Petersburg, where he will be involved in the many plots that threaten the throne of Czar Peter III…

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.
